name: Ganbatte!! Robochan
description:
Ganbatte!! Robochan - Demo 

Please, read the instructions bellow before playing:

1 - Objective:

Collect all the red crystals to open the gate in the end of the level. Enter the gate to finish the stage. 

2 - Commands (Keyboard or XInput Joystick):

A key or Dpad Left:  move LEFT.

D key of Dpad Right:  move RIGHT.

W key or Dpad Up:  GRAB ladders and move UP on ladders. 

S key or Dpad Down: move DOWN on ladders. 

J key or A button: JUMP.

K key or X button: SHOOT.

Enter or Start button: activate menu options, skip cutscenes. 

ESC or Back button: restart game. 

Thank you for playing! :)
